--- Task B ---
Quadratic spline
Coefficients for constant function:
b = ( 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 )
c = ( 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 )
Expected b[i] = 0, c[i] = 0 for all i

Coefficients for linear function:
b = ( 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 )
c = ( 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 )
Expected b[i] = 1, c[i] = 0 for all i

Coefficients for quadratic function:
b = ( 1 1 5 5 9 9 13 13 17 )
c = ( 0 2 0 2 0 2 0 2 0 )
Expected b[1,1,5,5,9,9,...] = 0, c[i] = [0,2,0,2,...] for all i
